name: Corner Driver
description: If you love racing and want to test out your skills, try out this interesting arcade racing game today!

name: Arcade Archives: Metal Black
description: "Metal Black" is a shooting game released by Taito in 1991. Set on a world on the brink of destruction at the hands of interstellar invaders, players take control of the secret fighter Black Fly and take the battle to the enemy.

name: Pid
description: Set out on a gravity defying journey, alongside Kurt, a boy lost in space. Find a way to lead him home using only your wits.

name: Sword of the Vagrant
description:
Guide Vivian the Vagrant, through vibrant and dynamic landscapes while hacking and slashing a path from a quiet coastal village through mysterious forests, haunted castles, and wrecked battlegrounds. When the endless barrage of enemies have been vanquished, what solace will be left for our hero?
"Journey into a gorgeous hand-painted fantasy world known as Mythrilia and discover the truth about your bloodline and its darkest secret. Hack and slash a path from a quiet coastal village through mysterious forests, haunted castles, and wrecked battlegrounds. When the endless barrage of enemies have been vanquished, what solace will be left for our hero?

The Vagrant is a 2D action RPG. As Vivian, you will experience an exciting and challenging adventure focused on combat gameplay that utilizes combo chains, charge attacks, and special skills, all while improving your character's build through new equipment and abilities. Play casually or become a master combatant.

name: Animal Puzzle Cats
description: Discover cats & puzzles in this simple adventure! Play alone or with friends! Try your best as an animal puzzle maker. Earn new stages, discover new pictures and try your best!

name: Baby Shapes for Kids
description: Fun and intuitive matching game for your baby or toddler! It helps to learn shapes and colors in game. Learning shapes is easy and entertaining and your child will love it too!

name: Swoon! Earth Escape
description: The planet is flooded with a mysterious green acid. Help Swoon and the rest of the crew escape the Earth. Collect all the mechanical parts of your spaceship and face the most daring bosses in this epic retro-style journey!

name: War of Ships
description: If you love pirate games or just want to become the best ship master, give War of Ships a try today and take over the seas!

name: WWII: Tank Battle Arena
description:
As an American Army Captain during World War II, you take the lead of a fleet of allies tanks fighting throughout Europe against axis armies.

In this arena game, you will have to show your skills to defeat enemies while saving your life and those of your soldiers.

Designed to be as close to reality in terms of tanks driving and shooting, the game offers two types of fights, classical, where you have to reload your gun like in a standard tank, and mayhem fight, with heavy shooting aka very fast gun reloading.

Allies forces need you, Captain!

name: Ishu Saikyou-ou Zukan: Battle Colosseum
description: Sin descripción

name: Net Enjou Jikenbo: Moete Moeru SNS Idol Tenraku Illustration Quiz Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Cronostase Electric Collection
description: A collection of 7 different puzzle game modes (each with 50 levels) based on the box-pushing “Sokoban” genre of games. The game modes are all circuitry/electricity themed, but don't worry: prior knowledge of circuitry is not necessary.

name: Roswell's 66th Anniversary
description: The doodle marking the 66th Anniversary of the Roswell Incident tells the story of an alien, who, despite having mastered interstellar space travel, appears less than adept at making a smooth landing on Earth. The team was inspired by classic point-and-click adventure games, and wanted to invite users to help an alien repair its spacecraft by exploring a 1940's New Mexican landscape, interacting with farm animals, and solving puzzles. When designing the game, we tried to think of things from an alien's point of view... chatting with a cow or chicken would be just as novel as meeting human beings for the first time; horseshoes and sacks of feed might be considered fascinating artifacts.

name: Escape From Roswell
description: Your alien friend landed unsuccessfully on earth and army arrested him at a secret location. Your task now is to find him.

name: Super Army of Tentacles 3: The Search for Army of Tentacles 2 - Isle of the Cat Girls
description: You want to date Lovecratian Old God/Cat Girl hybrids, right?

name: Peak Angle: Drift Online - Japan Cars Pack
description: Expand Peak Angle: Drift Online with Japan Cars Pack DLC! From Japan come 4 Cars and 1 Wide Body Kit that everyone will want in their garage!

name: Dead or Alive 6: Energy Up! Training Wear Set
description: A set with all 16 Energy Up! Training Wear outfits.

name: Dead or Alive 5 Last Round: Core Fighters - Samurai Warriors Mashup Set
description: This set contains all the Samurai Warriors Mashup costumes. This set contains costumes for the following characters: All characters except Akira, Jacky, Pai, Sarah, and Naotora Ii. *The Azuchi stage shown in the screenshots cannot be used in this version of the game. *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.

name: Mighty Gunvolt Burst: Character Set - Rivals
description: This set of DLC characters contains the rival characters from "Mighty No. 9," "Azure Striker Gunvolt," and "Gal*Gun 2." This content adds "RAY," "Copen," and "Kurona" to the roster of playable characters.

name: Dynasty Warriors 9: Zhou Yu Additional Hypothetical Scenarios Set
description: Allows you to play a hypothetical story for Zhou Yu that differs from that found in the main story of "Dynasty Warriors 9".

name: Assetto Corsa: Red Pack
description: The Assetto Corsa: Red Pack includes 7 new legendary Italian cars!

name: The Settlers 7: Paths to a Kingdom - The Two Kings

description: Allows you to play a hypothetical story for Guo Jia that differs from that found in the main story of "Dynasty Warriors 9".

description: Six stages will be added to Hero Mode: "Wargod under Siege," "Fall of the Imperial Han," "Rise of Shu-Han," "Yiling in Flames," "Beyond the Peach Garden," and "Southern Campaign.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Hero Mode Additional Stage Set 2
description: Four stages will be added to Hero Mode: "Enmity of the Triumphant Ma," "Talent Above All," "Entering Shu," and "Liao at Hefei." "Enmity of the Triumphant Ma," "Talent Above All," and "Liao at Hefei" are story/movie only stages.

name: Fairy Tail: Levy
description: A set that includes the playable character "Levy", an additional story, and costumes.

name: Totally Reliable Delivery Service: Stunt Sets
description: Stunt Sets Island is a giant private island being used as the primary location of all upcoming motion pictures.

name: Fairy Fencer F: Weapon Change Accessory Set
description: Fairy Fencer F: Weapon Change Accessory Set includes Weapon Change Accessory Sets Little Black, Green, Icons, Little Purple, Purple, Reaper, Little White, and Yellow.

name: Mighty Gunvolt Burst: Character Set - Heroines
description: This set of DLC characters contains heroines from "Mighty No. 9," "Azure Striker Gunvolt," and "Gal*Gun" This content adds "Call", "Joule," and "Tenzou" to the roster of playable characters.

name: Embers of the Zombie Battlemage: Halloween - Real Werewolves of Massachusetts
description: Adds a new guest to the base game, as well as new story content for Leo!

name: Senran Kagura Reflexions: 30 Accessory Set
description: 30-Accessory Set is for use with Senran Kagura Reflexions.

name: SoulCalibur VI: Character Creation Set C
description: Celebrate 20 years of SoulCalibur with an all new Character Creation set!

name: Train Simulator: Settle Carlisle Specials Add-On
description: Settle-Carlisle Specials puts you in the cab of fabulous preserved steam locomotives as they haul trains full of rail fans along the Settle-Carlisle line.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Glasshouse Set Bundle
description: Take complete control over a prison break with the Glasshouse Set Bundle of premium gear items and weapon skins. The Glasshouse Set Bundle is included in the Year 2 Pass, and the Gold Edition.

name: Train Sim World 3: West Somerset Railway
description: Rolling hills, golden meadows and seaside views are yours to experience in Train Sim World 2: West Somerset Railway, bringing Britain's longest standard gauge heritage railway to life.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Praetorian Set Bundle
description: A warrior must learn and adapt to rise above all others. Purchase the Praetorian Set Bundle to receive Warlord-themed premium gear items and weapon skins.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Exodus Set Bundle
description: It's time to move forward and leave everything behind. Purchase the Exodus Set Bundle to receive all four Operation: Exodus themed premium gear items and weapon skins.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Breakaway Set Bundle
description: Will you fight for order or carve your own path? The Breakaway Set Bundle contains all four Breakaway themed DLCs including premium gear items and weapon skins.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Night Ops Set Bundle
description:
Purchase the Night Ops Set bundle to blend into the night with premium gear items and weapon skins.

The Night Ops Set contains the following DLC:
- Ghillie Gear Set for Security
- Nightstalker Gear Set for Insurgents
- Midnight Blue Weapon Skin Set for Security
- Red Dark Weapon Skin Set for Insurgents

This bundle gives you access to all four Operation Nightfall DLC sets

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Cold Blood Set Bundle
description: Winter has come to Insurgency: Sandstorm. Purchase the Cold Blood Set Bundle to receive winter-themed premium gear items and weapon skins to customize your characters in-game.

name: Dynasty Warriors 9: Xu Shu Additional Hypothetical Scenarios Set
description: Allows you to play a hypothetical story for Xu Shu that differs from that found in the main story of "Dynasty Warriors 9".

name: SoulCalibur VI: Character Creation Set A
description: Celebrate 20 years of SoulCalibur with an all new Character Creation set!

name: Samurai Warriors 4-II: Scenario Set
description: The complete set of additional stages.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Hero of Justice Pack Set
description: The Hero of Justice Pack Set bundles together both Packs 1 and 2!

name: Monster Jam Steel Titans: Fire & Ice Truck Bundle
description: Fire & Ice includes 12 more Monster Jam trucks to compete in – some from real life and some toy designs!

name: Need for Speed: Payback - Pontiac Firebird & Aston Martin DB5 Superbuild Bundle
description: Two iconic cars that made an impression on the silver screen.

name: Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All - The 70s Bundle
description: The 70s Car Bundle adds 70s-inspired car content to Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All! The DLC includes 14 new body kits, four new sets of rims, and a new parachute. An additional three paint bundles will let you fly your favorite nostalgic colors.

name: Pinball FX3: Marvel Pinball Season 2 Bundle
description:
Pinball FX3 and the Marvel Universe collide in Marvel Pinball Season 2 Bundle, bringing together a host of tables and packs inspired by Marvel’s exciting cadre of Heroes & Villains in this bundle!
Marvel Pinball Season 2 features the following tables and packs:
• Civil War
• Deadpool
• Venom
• Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy
• Marvel’s Ant-Man
• Marvel’s Avengers: Age of Ultron
• Marvel Pinball: Avengers Chronicles
• Marvel's Women of Power

name: Eternal Return: Character Bundle 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Eternal Return: Character Bundle 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Stories: The Path of Destinies & Omensight Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Rico: Breakout Bundle
description: Two cops, one case and only 24 hours to take them down... can you score the bust of a lifetime? Take the role of a loose cannon police detective and face off against criminal gangs in an exciting procedurally-generated action movie FPS. Join forces with a friend, online or locally, and take down those crooks in true buddy-cop style! This bundle contains both the base game "RICO" as well as the prison-themed DLC, "RICO - Breakout"

name: Tools Up!: The Renovation Spree Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Planet Coaster: Vintage & World's Fair Bundle
description: Take your coaster park to the next level with this incredible bundle containing four new coasters, six new rides, and over 600 scenery items! Experience the golden oldies with the Vintage Pack, and celebrate global culture with the World's Fair Pack.

name: Planet Coaster: Spooky & Adventure Bundle
description: Your guests are in for a treat with this exciting bundle combining the Spooky Pack and Adventure Pack! It contains five thrilling rides, two new entertainers, and hundreds of unique scenery pieces to feed your imagination and help you create your epic coaster park.

name: Cario 2
description: Cario continues his dangerous ride. Help him get as far as possible and get the highest score possible. Good luck on your journey!

name: Caravan Journey
description: Join this Caravan Journey thorough the camping in the car. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Cities: VR - Enhanced Edition
description: A spin-off of Cities: Skylines, developed with virtual reality headsets in mind. Just like in the original, in Cities: VR we deal with designing entire cities from scratch, which we can see both from the air and from the street level.

name: Wild Trax Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: The Pig D: Deluxe Edition
description: The deluxe adventure you and your friends need. Collect coins with the main here of the game The Pig D. Help him!

name: Rocketio 2
description: Rocketio 2 is a sequel to 2D shooter in a distant space. Find strength to fend off waves of enemy ships and defeat Boss. Good luck on your journey!

name: Police Simulator 2023
description: Patrol the streets and become the ultimate Police Officer!

name: BurgerWave
description: A fast-paced arcade game about Hamburgers and Vaporwave.

name: Nom Nom
description: A puzzle game for the playdate.

name: Spike II: The Great Emu War
description: Equipped of your minigun, try to survive to the horde of emus who will do their best to catch you.

name: Medial
description: Soduku-style puzzles.

name: Almost Tennis
description: Fast paced pong-like game for the Playdate

name: Fearless Four
description: A solo (or pass and play) Playdate game inspired by Fearsome Floors.

name: The Simorgh
description: A text-based adventure for the Playdate.

name: Baseball Brat Badventure
description: Puzzle Platforming for Playdate

name: No Mans Land
description: A simple 2 Player pong game for the playdate just with a skin over it.

name: Hero Blast
description: Sin descripción

name: The Backrooms: Realism
description: Sin descripción

name: Keep the Lights On!
description: Keep the Lights On! is a linear story-driven first-person horror experience. The story takes place in an idyllic small cabin in the cold deep woods of Finland. The game begins as you arrive at the cabin vacation weekend you won from a contest with your friends.

name: Crossroads: Escaping the Dark - Collector's Edition
description: A visit to Crossroads becomes a digital nightmare for a gamer struggling with a host of trauma-induced phobias!

name: Project Survivor
description: A retro style game that can be played in 2D platformer mode and top-down mode. Hunt monsters, collect coins, and buy weapons to become stronger. Play with 3-classes and a variety of weapons. Enjoy cute retro style pixel art that you see on a nostalgic CRT monitor filter.

name: Tiny Detour
description: Tiny Detour is a little relaxing story about a Broken Bridge on your way home. Head to the nearby forest village and discover very weird locals. Experience the adventure & explore the beautiful parts of the valleys while completing unique quests!

name: Body. Electric.
description: A third Person Roleplaying Adventure game set in the not-so-distant future that contains puzzles, flying cars, robot warfare, upgradeable weapons and exploration.

name: Bright Sudoku
description: Bright Sudoku is a unique Sudoku game, which includes traditional Sudoku games and original three-dimensional Sudoku games. The new 3D Sudoku experience brings more difficult Sudoku problems. The newly added dimensions make Sudoku solving more difficult. Come and experience!

name: Natsukiri: Summer Vacation At Kirishima House
description:
Your decision can mean the difference between life and death.
A horror suspense novel with beautiful graphics!

name: Prince Ajapanadam x Princess
description: Prince Anihonhiko, the prince from modern kingdom Ajapanadam alongside with his wife, princess Akorea-Aca from modern kingdom Akoreaeve got isekaid into medieval isekai world from their modern world. This isekai world got attacked by demon queen, Prince and Princess decided to save all princesses.

name: Liberation Special Forces
description: This is tactical first person shooter that you lead a small squad with different weapons to eliminate opressors to avoid them from terrorising free people.

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2
description: Dust off your torch and hammer - it's time to get back to work, you have a new job to do. Visit the new beach coast with the largest, biggest ship graveyard in the world, dismantle huge ship parts and collect tons of precious steel. Roll up your sleeves, it's time to get back to the business.

name: Puttzzle
description: Putt your ball in it!

name: Crumb Circuit Simulator
description: Powerful Realtime 3D Electronic Circuit Simulator

name: Begone Beast
description: Begone Beast is a spooky top-down action game for 1-4 players. HACK & SLASH & SCREAM through hordes of demons, endlessly changing levels, and ancient terrifying BEASTS. Harness the power of SNACKS, FLASHLIGHTS, and FRIENDSHIP in this scary (but also cute) race for survival!

name: Myasoid
description: Myasoid - This is an arena shooter about a huge worm that protects this planet from the invasion of dangerous alien ships.

name: Snoot Game
description:
You play as Anon, a lonely, faceless, nobody, reject who finds himself in the dinosaur themed acid trip of a school named Volcano High. Here Anon meets the qt ptero known as Fang and their clown-vomit colored posse of reject friends and other associated thorns-in-the-side. All of whom, you can read about here.

This game is a parody of Goodbye Volcano High.

name: Farm in the Horizon
description: You've woken up at Horizon-Valley, with one tool and a few coins you are about to start an epic adventure of creating the farm of your dreams. Are you ready to live off the land and turn the overgrown fields into a thriving home?

name: Cuppy's
description: You work the closing shift for a new ice cream parlor, Cuppy’s, that has been having strange occurrences recently. Quickly assemble every customer’s favorite ice cream flavors and toppings before these… strange occurrences… get even worse!

name: Demolition Pro Online
description: Start up the demolition excavator and use realistic tools to take down the buildings! Work in a team of up to 4 players and master the challenges in different jobs. This 3D demolition simulation is based on destruction, cleanup and recycling.

name: Isolation
description: Open world, multiplayer, zombie survival game where you battle the undead in a hostile environment. Explore the the hidden secrets of the moon and find a escape from the horrors that await.

name: Christmas Blaster
description: Christmas Blaster: Christmas Blaster is an Arcade-type action video game. Santa needs to save Christmas and face creatures with a lot of explosion in this action-packed game.

name: Gray
description: "Gray" is a first person, survival horror set around a Lunar prison colony, with a focus on story telling. Your oxygen is depleting as your mind is breaking. Can you smell the burning?

name: ServiceIT
description: If you love DIY and the world of technology isn't scary to you, don't wait and get at the helm of a recently acquired IT service! Repair equipment, configure it and develop the company. It's up to you to decide which jobs to do, who to hire and what you want your office to look like!

name: Shrieking Darkness
description: Close your eyes. Step into a world filled with nothing but darkness and terror, where everything wants to destroy you. Your time has come to fight the shrieking darkness, be brave and don't look back or you won't make it.

name: Reviver
description: Reviver is an adventure puzzle platformer game for two players, telling about mad scientist, parallel universes and the salvation of all things.

name: Wingy
description: Wingy is an adventure that takes shape in a vast open world that is fully explorable and rich in content. Engage in thrilling aerial battles, fight on the ground over floating islands and go beyond the borders of the known world to stop the war.

name: Sky Base Venus
description: Sky Base Venus is a colony simulator set in the upper atmosphere of Venus. Harvest resources from Venus and its atmosphere, build up your colony, grapple with disasters and system failures, and pursue self-sufficiency as your support from Earth dwindles.

name: Neon Noir
description: Neon Noir is an episode-based cyberpunk visual novel with interactive mechanics. It is set in the megalopolis of New Devon in the year 2169, where large private corporations have more power than the government. The player follows the crimes investigated by Colden, a Snatcher.

name: Tempo Trigger
description: Tempo Trigger is a rhythm and aiming skill game. Players can compete in the leaderboard or create something truly memorable with stream chat.

name: Iron Mandate
description: Master the piloting of giant mechanical worms, lay waste to all that stand in your way and reclaim your rightful place on the throne.

name: Miami Hotel Sim
description: A hotel management simulator that you can renovate and clean up that set in Miami inspired theme

name: Delivery Man
description: A small town food delivery man receives an order to deliver food to a strange house. When he arrived, he discovered that the house contained a terrifying secret that one who knew it would not be able to escape to tell others.

name: Siren Head: The Horror Experience
description:
While working the late shift at the Police Department, you receive a report about some teenagers that went missing in Windermere Woods. Old folk tales mention these woods, and of a monster that is said to lurk there, but those are just stories... right?

It is your job to find these teens, but you did not imagine the horrors you would face.
The old folks tale states that the mythical monster surrounds its habitat with siren noises of all kinds, luring unsuspecting victims.

name: For the Crown
description: For the crown is a Puzzle/Supply-chain game where the player obeys the crown's orders to build and develop a production chain to create items and charakters. The demands of the crown will increase according to the level, making the game and the tasks more and more complex.

name: New Cycle
description: Build a new civilization out of the chaos of an apocalyptic solar flare as you grow your House from a lone shelter to an industrial metropolis. Take on the burden of preserving life itself and help your people realize their aim: "A future beyond survival." Lead the world of New Cycle.

name: Huni Kuin: Beya Xinã Bena
description: A 2D platform game about the ancient stories of the Huni Kuin indigenous people, who live in the Brazilian Amazon. The entire game was produced in collaboration with the Huni Kuin communities of the Jordão river, in Acre.

name: Chess Royale
description: A non-standard chess game in which kings have magical powers. The player needs to cut down the enemy king, building a victorious tactics by combining the queue of moves and magical abilities.

name: Deep Sleep: Labyrinth of the Forsaken
description: What dreams are made of is the stuff of nightmares in this new point-and-click adventure. Delve deep into realms both fantastical and terrifying, and use the power of lucid dreaming to solve puzzles, explore, and contend with eerie adversaries in your search for the brother you thought had died.

name: Talus
description: Control Talus in this challenging boss rush where you'll face powerful enemies to reach your mysterious goal

name: Ocelot Sunrise
description: Ocelot Sunrise is a top-down action roguelite based in a unique sci fi universe, with a very broad metagame that can add a unique twist to the genre. Re-discover a universe lost to an alien threat in a detailed Comic-Noir art style.

name: Broken Lens
description: Broken Lens is a cosy game about spotting the differences between two scenes and thus discover the story of a little broken robot. Will you be able to uncover all the secrets?

name: Comit Legends
description: Comit Legends is a remake of the first five Comit games, built from the ground up with a new engine. Replay Comit's fight against the evil space pirate Krater and the universe conquering leader of the Star Knights, Cosmo Knight.

name: Age of Pyramids
description: Age of Pyramids is a sandbox city builder and simulator set in Ancient Egypt. You take on the city governor and architect’s mantle to build the most incredible city on Earth. You will have to gather dozens of resources to maintain happiness of your people and prosperity.

name: Death by Begonia
description: Death by Begonia is a surreal LGBTQ+ Southern gothic murder mystery. Follow Riley's attempts to reconnect with old childhood friends in a town haunted by annual serial murders. Will you fall in love and unlock the mysteries hidden in your friends' hearts? Or will you die trying?

name: Soul After
description: Sin descripción

name: See Ya Later!
description: Your ship crash landed on a randomly generated map, survive long enough to escape by crafting, mining, fishing, and farming!

name: Nicely Dicely
description: Nicely Dicely is a fun local multiplayer game based on physics, for up to four simultaneous players. You can decide, if you want to compete against all other players or in teams. Each player controls a player cube on a dynamically changing playing board.

name: Popcorn Rocket
description: Popcorn Rocket is a silly food based old-school arcade space shooter. Pilot the Popcorn Rocket as you blast through hordes of food spaceships in order to save the galaxy from the evil Nebula Empire! With a wacky cast of heroes and villains, Popcorn Rocket will leave your stomach wanting more!

name: Neko Cafe
description: Design and build your business into the best café in New Neko City! Craft masterpiece sandwiches, manage employees, unlock upgrades and items to fully customise your café, win over picky food critics, and compete in cooking competitions!

name: Shuffle Tactics
description: Shuffle Tactics is a roguelike deckbuilding tactical RPG. Strategize to survive tough battles, pick the right cards to create powerful synergies, and bond with your sidekicks to get an edge in battle. Adventure awaits! Will you rise as Asteria's new King?

name: Darksite
description: Darksite is a first person single player horror experience. Explore different locations and find out where your friend went off to. Use puzzle elements, exploration and audio cues to reach the end goal.

name: Opaloid Kingdom
description: Explore dungeons filled with monsters, traps and gold coins! Opaloid Kingdom is a retro-style dungeon crawler set in a medieval world. Enjoy quick and satisfying gameplay in a magical land full of wizards, treasure and dragons!

name: GladiEaters
description: A hybrid between Turn-Based Tactics and Cooking Mini-Games where food you cook turns into powerful Gladieaters for you to command. Cook your team from Eggs, Pastries and Vegetables - balancing the Taste of the team between Sweet, Salty and Umami - to unlock powerful taste twists.

name: Spin Kick Ninjas
description: A co-op roguelike for 1-4 players with missions and levels that include classic gameplay of pinball, brick breaker, mini-golf and soccer combined with ninjas, stats, power-ups, and enemies. Build your clan, crush the darkness.

name: Dino Trauma
description: Dino Tauma introduces you to a secret laboratory somewhere in eastern Europe where gore and dinosaurs isn't unusual thing. Retro FPS inspired by the '90s legends.

name: Witches and Butchers
description: Witches and Butchers is a retro horizontal shoot-'em-up with RPG Elements. Control two characters at the same time, each one with their unique skills and roles, from a party that keeps getting bigger as you progress! Use the cooking system to enhance your character's skills and stats!

name: Nuclear Option
description: Fly near-future aircraft with immersive physics on intense battlefields, facing land, air and sea threats. Wage war against AI or other players with an array of potent weapons. Wield tactical and strategic nuclear weapons, capable of annihilating anything in their path.

name: Nash Racing: Pursuit
description: You are Kevin Nash criminal whose mission is to find million dollar cash in several areas. You have limited time to find money and need avoid police cars.

name: Ski3
description: The unending, relaxing and somewhat harrowing experience of the classic 90's game in this 3D take on the old adventure.

name: One For Two
description: One For Two is a very fast platform game, where the subtlety is that you control two characters at the same time. You must drive both blobs to the end of each level but be careful, if only one fails then you will lose.

name: The Shadow Over Route 80
description: Alone at night, working at a petrol station deep in the American wheat belt. Something feels off... are you sure you're alone? A short 10-15 minute horror game with multiple endings.

name: Fields of Mistria
description: Start your new life! Build the farm of your dreams as you discover a world brimming with possibilities. Magic, romance, and adventure all await you in this nostalgic farming / life sim RPG!

name: Phylakterion
description: Phylakterion is a 1-4 player online co-op horror game. You and your friends will enter different locations in search of a possessed vessel. Search, Identify, and Destroy the vessel and the entity inhabiting it – and be quick, or the entity will find you first!

name: The Spirit of the Samurai
description: A village in peril. A samurai reanimated. An Oni advancing. Fight an army of undead warriors and Japanese monsters as a human, a Kodama, and a cat in this 2D stop-motion action adventure.

name: My Darkest Witch
description: My Darkest Witch is a survival arena with huge waves of enemies caused by massive infestations of an unholy plague.

name: Cult of the Mask
description: Incomprehensible guys decided to organize a cult dedicated to an incomprehensible mask, you need to stop this business! Will you?

name: The Hidden and Unknown
description: The Hidden and Unknown is a story-based game, that aims to widen the perception of its audience in the areas of psychology and philosophy.

name: Volley Court
description: This is a 3D volleyball game developed by an actual volleyball team member. Whether you have ever played volleyball or not, you can enjoy the fun of this sport here. Support multiplayer online battle! You can call up to 11 friends and form two teams to battle.

name: Kitball 20000
description: Kitball is a homage to classic old-school Maze Shooters of the 90's era, featuring modernized gameplay and graphics, while still holding onto the original simplicity and charm of its inspiration.

name: It's All In Your Head
description: 2D Side Scrolling Platformer with 3D isometric exploration elements

name: Phones Not Allowed
description: School is too boring? The temptation of using your phone is too strong? Be careful, teacher is watching you! Interact with and collect awesome anime artworks while keeping tabs of your teacher and classmates. Don't get caught or you will be suspended!

name: Drag and Drop
description: Remember how you dragged the little man into google maps? Try something like this in the game Drag and Drop!

name: Ravyne
description: A classic roguelike, in which you must explore randomly generated terrain in search of a mythical artifact. Defending yourself from attackers in turn based combat along the way.

name: Cardboard Town
description: Cardboard Town is a city building card game. Manage your resources, obtain upgrades, draw your cards and thrive! Random events, quest cards and options make each run different. Use your Action Cards wisely along with your Building Cards.

name: The Heart of the Teddy Bear
description: Immerse yourself in a relaxed, wintry adventure of emotions and accompany the teddy bear in his search for his child and his purpose in life. After falling out of Santa's sleigh, you'll start in a desolate winter forest and make your way alone to your destination.

name: Ferromon Together
description: Journey with your friends in the free to play world of Ferromon Together and take on the 10 towers with over 140 Ferromon to save the world's inhabitants from the Tainted!

name: Adventures of Skye the Slime Maid
description: Join the cool and sociable MC's RPG medieval-themed, romance-comedy, fantasy visual novel adventures with his magical, beautiful monster girl, slime maid, to become the best Adventurers in the country.

name: Princess Ruby
description: Princess Ruby is a 2D Platformer aimed at young children. Play as a princess and run, jump and sometimes ride a unicorn through each level. Dress up how you want, change your hairstyle and the colors of your costume.

name: Chain Detonation
description: Outline "Chain Detonation" is his TopDown 2D action game in which he has to defeat many enemies to advance. The purpose is to operate the player and defeat many monsters and bosses. There are a wide variety of monsters in each stage, and the game will be cleared by defeating the boss of all stages.

name: The Work of Your Hands
description: The Work of Your Hands is a small-scale, deep, and relaxing open-world survival crafting game. You have no crafting screen or list of items. Harvest raw materials, create tools from them, build practical structures, and grow delicious food. You are in control of every step to live off the land.

name: Plants vs. Zombies 2: Alternate UniverZ
description: Plants vs. Zombies 2: Alternate UniverZ is a PvZ2 mod that aims to revamp PvZ2 vanilla with nostalgic changes such as PvZ1 progression and the return of 25 sun meta, along with extra content and mechanics. Its difficulty is targeted towards more casual players and slowly accelerates as the game progresses, but there is extra content for experienced players as well!

name: God Souls
description: God Souls is a 3D hardcore action game based on Nordic mythology. The main content of the game is invigorating and exciting combat, and it has combined a variety of elements and ability development systems.

name: Surviving the Abyss
description: Discover and mine resources for construction, light your way in the dark, explore and expand into your surroundings to advance your research. Capture the diverse, highly-adapted flora and fauna of the deep, but beware: the darkness hides unexpected horrors, with only the light keeping them at bay.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Rhythm Game Song Pack Vol.2
description: The second edition of the highly popular "Sound Game Music Pack" is finally here! Six popular songs well-known in music games and six challenge stages playable with each song have been added!

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Lord of Demons
description:
Lord of Demons is an original maybe scenario.
You play as Estelle, daughter of the King of Demons, Pluton, as well as his heir apparent- as far as she's concerned. Yet the nobles that surround her father's court don't see her as such, and there's only so much you can do as a demon with little to no powers left in their body. Eager to prove herself to the court and her father, she heads into the world of humans and enlists the help of three men who seem to be willing to do anything for her. But in such a world that fears demons as much as they do, Estelle must do as much as she can to not only succeed, but survive. Can Estelle retrieve the powers she lost once upon a time, and return to the demon world as a champion?

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - A Good Day to Be a Dog
description: A Good Day To Be A Dog is based off the webtoon of the same name. Covering the events of the original webtoon, you play as Hana Han, a teacher at Garam High School who has a terrible secret. If she kisses someone, she'll turn into a dog every subsequent night until she kisses them again in that form! Struggling to find out the events of what happened that drunken night, she has to figure out which of the three men she kissed. Will she ever get rid of this horrid curse?

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - My Ex Is So Into Me
description: My Ex is So into Me is based off the novel and webtoon, My Ex-Boyfriends Fell in Love With Me. During the events of the book, you control and play as Hana Bom, team leader of Han Bom Door Lock Company. What was thought to be a regular meeting with Wood Rail's field team and planning department representatives, Hana comes face-to-face with two men she never thought she'd see again: her ex-boyfriends! Struggling to keep her work and personal life seperate, Hana finds that not everyone is too happy to see her reunite with old flames. Will she figure out her feelings towards two people she never meant to see again?

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Remarried Empress
description: Remarried Empress is based off of the novel and webtoon of the same name. Covering the events of the original novel, you control and play as Navier Troby, Empress of the Eastern Empire. Struggling to stay on top of her duties as Empress whilst her husband dotes constantly on his new concubine, Navier riddles with the looming threat of the ever-increasing chance of being deposed by the man she promised her life to. Will she be able to find her own happy ending, or will she be doomed to become a forgotten piece of history as the ex-lover of the Emperor?

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Lady in Armour
description: Lady in Armour is based off the novel, Return of the Female Knight. Covering the events of the original novel, you play as Elena Blaise, a knight who's forcibly awakened to the living world once more after seeing the rest of her family massacred. Vowing to avenge the lives of her family in her previous life, and to protect them in this one, she makes a deal with the crown prince after saving his life: marry her, and she will protect him for the rest of her days. Will she be able to prevent her family's collective doom?

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - My Dear Goddess
description: My Dear Goddess is based off the novel Oh My Goddess.

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - A Bite of You
description: A Bite of You is based off the novel, Come Here, Eat It. You play as Bora, a newcomer at the gaming company Enfort. She's been looking forward to live a comfortable, cushy life at her new job, but... who are these mysterious men, and what do they want with her? And more importantly, who, or what is the King of Gumiho? Will she ever be able to live a happy corporate life?

name: Junkbot
description:
Junkbot is a Shockwave puzzle-platformer that was hosted on the official LEGO website in 2001. The player must place LEGO bricks to form paths and stairways so Junkbot can reach and consume all the recycling bins in a level. The game would receive a sequel titled "Junkbot Undercover" in 2003.

Despite being officially licensed by LEGO, Junkbot never appeared in any physical LEGO sets, though the "Haunted House" set from 2021 features a hidden box containing his parts.

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Keeper of Mine
description: Keeper of Mine is based off of the novel and promotional webtoon, I'll Protect the Second Male Lead's Love! During the events of the book, you control and play as Leah Stephilia De Lenokyn as she navigates the world of 'From Hostage to Empress', a novel read shortly before her transmigration. Eager to save the tragic fate of the second male lead, Ain, she pushes the female lead towards him in hopes they can trigger their happy ending. Will she be able to save the second male lead's love?

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Kill Your Boss
description: Kill Your Boss is an original maybe series. The book has you play as Alex Miller, a CIA agent working undercover at a violent organization. After signing up to become a CIA agent to protect his sickly, younger sister, Hailey, he finds that he's gained more than he's bargained for when he catches the eye of three prime players in this twisted game. Torn between the bonds he's formed in the violent organization and the CIA, Alex realizes he must quickly decide where his loyalties lie. Will he be able to come out of this situation unscathed?

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Own My God
description: Own My God is an original maybe series. "Which god will you choose?" A mysterious golden apple gives you the right to choose the next King of the Gods. Instead of deciding, you say you’ll choose the god you fall in love with! Kind, Dangerous, or Boyishly Charming? Who will you choose?!

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Mary Go Round
description: Mary Go Round is an original maybe series romance visual novel. You’ve been living a miserable life after marrying your first love. One day, you end up in a meteor shower, and you’re suddenly the young age of 18 again, getting another shot at choosing your first love. Who will it be? The man you loved, or the CEO-to-be?

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Cliché is Classic
description: Cliché Is Classic is an original maybe series romance visual novel. "You're not supposed to like me!" Jean River is a shameless writer whose built his career around stealing other people's stories. After a night of drinking, he finds himself in the world of a hetero romance novel written by a nameless writer. He accidentally kisses the male protagonist, and the story starts shifting to gay romance… Can he safely escape the chaotic narrative?

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Wild Pitch
description: Wild Pitch is an original maybe series romance visual novel.

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Long Live the Empress: Curse & Love
description: Long Live The Empress: Curse And Love is an original maybe series. You, the Empress, are told that sleeping with your consort is the only way to break the Heath Empire's curse. But instead of the man your family chose for you, you decide to bring in a beautiful slave as your lover… Who will you choose in the midst of this chaos?

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Long Live the Empress II: Dragon Master
description:
Long Live the Empress S2: Dragon Master is an original maybe series.
Long Live the Empress S2: Dragon Master is the second book of the Long Live the Empress series.

name: Hello Kitty Asobi no Omochabako
description: This interactive title takes the player to Hello Kitty's bedroom with a number of activities and features several different Sanrio characters. Activities vary from a slot machine, an art page with stickers, dressing up Hello Kitty, and a Janken game.

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Royal Blood 2: Secret Lesson
description: Royal Blood Season 2: Secret Lesson is the second of two books in the Royal Blood series.

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - The Tyrant's Bodyguard
description: ''The Tyrant's Bodyguard''' is an original ''maybe'' series. You play as Jin Park, a bodyguard-for-hire working at Guard One, the nation's top private security company. After a night out with his best friend leaves his life hopelessly entangled with the royal family, he finds that he must make a decision that will impact the rest of his life: swear his fealty to the royal family, or cling to the revenge that his parents desperately held unto. Will he be able to sort out where his loyalties lie?

name: The Tyrant's Bodyguard 2: Restoration
description: The Tyrant's Bodyguard 2: Restoration is the second of two books in the The Tyrant's Bodyguard series.

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Flower Lane: A Record of Romance
description: Flower Lane: A Record of Romance is an original maybe series. In it, you play as Taylor Jones, a new student of Bloomingdale University. After being kicked out by her landlord due to sudden renovations, she finds herself with nowhere to go, and must find a place to live in for one month before she's able to move back in. By chance, she meets the three top-most celebrities at her university... and they're willing to room with her! Will she be able to find love before time runs out?

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Flower Lane 2: A Lingering Fragrance
description: Flower Lane 2: A Lingering Fragrance is an original maybe series. Our story, 7 years later- Seven years after college, you are no longer a young, brash freshman but a seasoned professional in your field. But things take an unexpected turn at work as you run into your ex-lover and flatmates from seven years ago...

name: Ikemen Bakumatsu: Unmei no Koi Hana no Miyako to Koi no Ran
description: PS Vita and PS4 port of the original smartphone release.

name: Boxy & Prisma
description: Two cubes found themselves in a bit of a pickle. They've woken up in an abandoned crate factory! Worst yet, they no longer have each other's embrace! Can you help them reunite and get home?

name: MapFriend
description: Google Maps, but it's a horror game

name: Quickscope Simulator
description: This is the game where you quickscope and get care packages. This is Quickscope Simulator!

name: The Jumping Tofu
description: Join BIG T on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: The Jumping Tofu: Turbo
description: Join BIG T on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Caravan Journey: Nitro
description: Join this Caravan Journey thorough the camping in the pimped car with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Ping Pong Peg
description: Ping Pong Peg is an intense arcade style game full of RPG elements and strategy. As the player, you control the top and bottom paddles trying to hit all of the pegs in each level by keeping the ball in play with the bumpers. Clearing the levels allows you to upgrade the bumpers, balls, and abilities to improve your odds of beating the levels and defeating the bosses. Do you have what it takes to master the pegs?

name: Quiz Thiz USA
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: The Preschoolers: Season 1 - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Lost August
description: 082192 is a single-player open-world walking simulator game based on the concept of liminal spaces and the backrooms. Experience a dream-like world through the lens of a VHS camera as you explore the contents of a recently discovered video tape.

name: 5.5 Rooms
description: Yesterday you were at a graduation party, and today you find yourself half-naked in blood, handcuffed to the radiator. Find out what happened and try to figure out what to do with it next. Explore the strange apartment to discover its secrets in a meditative narrative dark adventure.

name: 5 Days
description: Five days is a fully open world, no limits time travel puzzle adventure. This game isn't just a time loop of the same day on repeat, this game lets you travel between five different days. Use your knowledge of the future and ability to travel to the past to assassinate a heavily defended king.

name: Acid Puzzle
description: Acid Puzzle is a minimalistic puzzle game. As an experienced fitter, you are laying pipes into joints to pave the way for toxic waste from the upper level to the lower.

name: Across-Stitch
description: Grab your favorite cozy, warm drink and stitch colorful puzzles. Even create your own cross-stitches!

name: A Drop of Hope
description: Use your different physical properties and states of matter to overcome challenges in this 2D puzzle platformer. Set in an oppressive industrial world dominated by machines, you are the only hope to restore nature and save the planet.

name: Adventure Awaits
description: Adventure Awaits bucks the current trend of endless stats & dialog by bringing back the era of the Ultimas (Exodus, Quest for the Avatar, etc.) when RPGs were simpler and more approachable. The story, quests, and all maps are procedurally generated to provide endless replayability.

name: Against the Backrooms
description: No clipped through your ground, huh ? What a shame... Well get used to it ! You'll live in the Backrooms now. To summarize : run for your life, hide from the entities, and keep track of your surroundings, you don't want to get separated from your group...

name: A Game You Can Afford In This Economy
description: Everything is getting unaffordably expensive. Groceries. Bills. How long is this even sustainable? Enter the world of the protagonist, and find out if you have what it takes to turn your life around. A point-and-click, choice-driven adventure of modern survival.

name: Aimtropolis
description: Do you think you have a good aim? Prove it. Aimtropolis is a VR arcade/shooter where you will have to prove yourself and the rest of the world in 12 random mini-games from the 50 available. Get the highest score, and position yourself as a world champion.

name: Alien
description: Alien is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story is about a guy who has been dreaming of having sex with an alien woman for a very long time. At some point, this dream comes true and the guy finally got an alien woman!

name: Blobek
description: Speed ACTION! Excellent soundtrack! Fast JUMP! Disaster! RAMPAGE! ENERGY!

name: Blood Exile
description: Blood Exile is an arcade top down shooter with elements of procedural generation. Immerse yourself in the ancient world of magic, protecting it from the invasion of the undead.

name: Sweeping the World
description: Sweeping the World is a mild rougelike game. The enemies come like a tide. You must survive and gain more powerful power! Combine the peerless power to stop all enemies! At the same time, use the spiritual stone obtained to refine yourself and become the most powerful immortal cultivator!

name: Automata
description: Massive mutant creatures are coming at you, control your automata to beat them!

name: Saraba Gekiyaki: Encore
description: Sin descripción

name: Shichisei Tantei Club: Koganemushi-tachi no Kisou
description: A clickable adventure game reminiscent of detective adventure games of the '80s and '90s. The story follows the main character, a young detective, as he meets a series of unique characters and works to solve a case.

name: Zankinzoken
description: We are trying to complete the tasks given to us with our robot. While completing our missions, we need to destroy many enemies and bosses. 3 different weapons we have and using different strategies, we can destroy the enemies.

name: YAMC: Yet Another Minesweeper Client
description: Yet Another Minesweeper Client is here to evoke pure apathy from onlookers! Come play the newest reimagining of that game that comes with most operating systems.

name: Xmas Apocalypse
description: It's Christmas Eve during the Zombie Apocalypse and Santa has to gun down hordes of the undead or Christmas is ruined! Level up your firearms with upgrades from the Christmas skill tree and find the most destructive combinations. A festive time-survival third-person shooter with roguelite elements.

name: WWE 2K22: nWo 4-Life - Bonus Pack
description: The WWE 2K22 nWo 4-Life Bonus Pack is just too sweet, with playable nWo Superstars, two arenas, nWo Wolfpac Championship & more!

name: Wrestling Manager 2023
description: Do you have what it takes to bring your Wrestling Company to the top!? Wrestling Manager 2023 is an easy-to-use game where you manage a wrestling company, and bring it to the mountain top!

name: White Mourning: Museum In Pale
description: White Mourning: Museum In Pale is a fan game of Disco Elysium, based on White Mourning (the DE fanart book). You can wander around as a pixel RPG character. Meet with familiar people, review your familiar past, and collect all kinds of artwork.

name: Wild Rumble
description: Wild Rumble is a 3v3 roguelike soccer game in which you'll evolve your team as you score goals through dangerous arenas. Unlock new characters, master their abilities and pick the best upgrades to lead your team to victory!

name: Windhelm
description: Soar into the unexplored world of Windhelm, an open-world fantasy RPG. Fly through the floating islands as you go on a mighty quest to defeat monsters, clear dungeons, and battle perilous enemies. Survive the harsh elements with nothing but your wits and craftable items.

name: Oil Rush: Tower Defense Map Pack
description: The first DLC for the unique real-time naval strategy game “Oil Rush” features a completely new tower defense game experience, including a tower defense co-op mode. Exploit new strategies with completely new technology tree, assault and defense units. The Oil Rush is never over!

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol. 10 - KI-Busse
description: The popular OMSI download pack series with AI expansions goes into the next round. The 10th part contains varied AI buses that enrich every OMSI map.

name: OMSI 2: Downloadpack Vol. 1 - KI-Fahrzeuge
description: With the new product series OMSI 2 - Download Pack, Halycon Media starts a new series of add-ons for the popular OMSI 2 - Omnibus-Simulator. In the first part, we provide you with more than 30 different AI vehicles for the existing OMSI maps.

name: OMSI 2: Heuliez Bus-Pack Generation X17
description: After the successful debut of the French manufacturer Heuliez Bus as a DLC for OMSI in 2020, the French developer collective Acrotere Design offers you to discover the manufacturer through the first edition of the Access'Bus range as we know it today: the X17 generation.

name: OMG: One More Goal - Basic Campaigns Pack
description: This pack contains two fantastic basic add-on campaigns, with new scenarios, obstacles and goals: - Grassland 1 - Tropical 1 This DLC finally completes the planned game's series of THREE basic campaigns

name: Omega Quintet: Potent Protection Pack
description: The Potent Protection Pack includes: Rare Armor Set, New Protector Set, New Attachment Set

name: Omega Quintet: Mega Mic Pack
description: The Mega Mic Pack includes: Plushy Cat Paw Hammer, Avenger's Spear, Flying Fists, Mega Rifle, Angel Wing

name: No Random Novels
description: I woke up in a BL novel? The Story of Taeran's Struggle to Escape Fiction BL Ren'ai Simulation "No Random Novels"

name: Null G
description: Welcome to Null G space station. A competitive and adaptive environment for flexible battle training. The Battle School creates peer to peer opposition in fast-paced combat training sims and solo training against rigorously designed AI drones. Team up or fly solo to win the advantage.

name: O2Jam Online
description: From the iconic songs to customizing your game UI and new tracks available to play! O2 Jam is now available on Steam~!

name: Odania Sports Arena
description: Odania Sports Arena is a VR sci-fi game that allows players to enjoy hitting targets coming from outer space. In different kinds of games you can hit the targets from outer space.

name: Odin's Tea Party
description: 1-800-ValhallaIsCalling will you answer? Can you fight the horde and for how long? Cement your place within Odin's Tea Party to prove you have what it takes to beat the rest!

name: New Hire
description: A horror job simulation game where you have to avoid the dangers lurking in the shadows while finishing your job and getting your paycheck.

name: N2O
description: Pilot your customized craft across 30 psychedelic tubular levels of adrenaline-pumping action, fighting a constant stream of terrifying insectoid aliens trying to stop you in your tracks, all set to a soundtrack by The Crystal Method. Features a 2-player local coop mode.

name: Nocturnal Visitors
description: Investigate morally grey crimes in this fantasy thriller in where magic and science, chaos and order, are two sides of the same coin.

name: N.O.M.A.D.
description: In this innovative top-down shooter from 1985, pilot the Nemesis Organisation Mobile Attack Droid (N.O.M.A.D.) through the heavily armoured homeworld of galactic supervillain Cyrus T. Gross, solving tricky puzzles, dodging deadly hazards, and shooting fiendish enemies.

name: Keep Sheep
description: Match 3 sheep tiles. Join the match 3 adventure! Let's Keep Sheep!

name: Witchpunk
description: Play as a skateboarding witch who battles against a tyrannical corporation seeking to destroy Halloween. Gain speed on your skateboard and use your hammer to deliver devastating melee attacks!

name: Look For Danger
description: An interactive novel puzzle adventure game

name: Catbusters
description: Catbusters is a multiplayer VR wave shooter where you blast hoards of evil vampire cats.

name: Sex Teacher
description: Sex Teacher is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story is about two young senior students. Erika is writing her thesis about sex, but she has never done it! Her friend Aaron rushes to help her!

name: Lab Inspect
description: You play as an inspector tasked with checking one of the Tepas labs. Strange things have been happening in the lab for a long time. It's time to check what's wrong with him.

name: Show Ball: Tiger Life
description: Show Ball: Tiger Life is a challenge where you will have to overcome 200 levels making a single movement. Enjoy 25 illustrated scenes, upgrades, multiple skins with realistic physics, classical music, and an ultra-realistic stage. Show Ball: Tiger Life… Let the show begin!

name: Furry Killer
description: "Furry Killer" is a fast-paced arena shooter where you fight against waves of evil furry creatures. Defeat them, collect coins, and upgrade your weapons to survive in an endless mode.

name: Ferd
description: As a Viking warrior, you embark on a journey of vengeance through the magnificent Nordic landscapes of the Viking Age. With bow and arrow you defend yourself and your Viking comrades from hordes of attacking enemies.

name: Sex Adventures: Kinky Bondage
description: An erotic visual novel about a young woman who opens up about her sexuality and engages in BDSM activities with a guy she met online.

name: Rod Multiplayer Car Driving
description: Get ready for an immersive car racing game with rod multiplayer car driving. Damage your opponents in multiplayer mode with rockets.

name: Moto Trophy VR
description: Take part in the motorcycle trophy. Upgrade your bike, win a lot of different races, and go! To the prizes, and much more to enjoy gameplay using your VR-headset!

name: Iron Guard
description: A bite-sized pixel art tower defense game.

name: Flowers of Satsunai
description: Join the maidens of this artistic Japanese-inspired world on an adventure to defeat a mutant threat. Love, lust, and lies await. Unfold the truth with your reactive and proactive skills in this simple yet challenging puzzle game.

name: Tales of Therapy
description: “Tales of Therapy” is a turn-based combat system rpg game with original soundtracks and character art. It takes place in a storytale created in a therapy session.

name: Sex Adventures: Cuckold Gym
description: An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of a personal trainer becoming a cuckold for his very sexy client and her overbearing boyfriend, who decided to drop by unexpected at the gym.

name: Dream Clovers
description: Welcome to VR job experience!'Dream Clovers' is an educative game application supporting VR-based job experience contents.Recently there are two contents, firefighter and astronaut. More contents will be registered soon.

name: Sword&Magic
description: Welcome to the magical continent of the Middle Ages full of magic and monsters! Everything you want will happen here! Just help the magicians touch the petrified seal and they will help you fight monsters!

name: Wheel of Naughtiness
description: The Wheel of naughtiness is a casual hentai game that combines visual novels and interactive animations, experience love story with 6 girls. Unlock gallery mode to relive the good night.

name: Party Park
description: Having trouble with your friends deciding which game to play? The Party Park will become your place of leisure among friends. Become a god and create your own world for you and your friends.

name: Fish Bone
description: As you land on a planet filled with water, you must survive, explore the world, take on missions from the underworld. or even robbed You can choose your own style of play.

name: Tiny Onion Knight
description: Tiny Onion Knight is an action-platformer about a little onion knight who travels through a mystical forest.

name: Theocracy
description: Classic 4X turn-based strategy game, where you manage a theocratic empire, conquer and convert pagans and enemies by divine power or brute force, cast mighty miracles and enact dogmas. Advance and expand your theocracy into dominant world empire. And if necessary... release the Kraken!

name: VR Archeology: Secrets of Kulikovo Field
description: What mysteries and keys to historical secrets are hidden underground? In this interactive VR game, you will explore the roles of modern archaeologists, restoration experts and re-enactors. Discover dozens of unique artifacts dating back to the Battle of Kulikovo on this thrilling expedition.

name: Aviator: Air Combat
description: Plunge into the world of sky battles. Pursue an enemy bomber while dodging oncoming missiles. Get your adrenaline pumping and be rewarded with a bonus level.

name: Hentai BunnyGirl
description: Hentai BunnyGirl is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of bunny girl and 24 unique sexy girls Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Once in a Blue Moon
description: Welcome to Once in a Blue Moon (OIABM), a beautifully hand-crafted experience that is literally out of this world. Set in a cosmic galaxy, you will have the chance to take a walk through an immersive forest with shafts of glorious light generated by the large Blue Moon in orbit.

name: Idle Shapes
description: Idle game with simple mechanics but truly addictive gameplay. Collect various shapes, buy upgrades and use prestige system to proceed as far as you can. Every upgrade matters, every prestige purchase is important. No endless goals and infinite boring gameplay. Just pure fun and adequate goals.

name: Orbital Clash
description: Turn-based space battle tactical/strategic game

name: Lims

description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary tool: The Concubine (Hunter), Shahmaran (Sparks LRR), Sister’s Anguish (Hand Crossbow), and Pride’s Death (Heavy Knife).

name: Butterfly's Poison: Blood Chains - Fantasy Night Stories
description:
Fandisc for "Butterfly's Poison: Blood Chains".

The fandisc adds onto what happened after the events of the happy endings as well as expanding on popular bad ends. There are lots of small bonuses, like a cult quiz, "Chou Doku Questions and Answers Notebook", and "Kyouko's Fortune Telling Hut".

name: Treasure Seekers: The Time Has Come
description:
Treasure Seekers: The Time Has Come the fourth instalment in the Treasure Seekers series, after Visions of Gold, The Enchanted Canvases, and Follow the Ghosts. It details Nelly and Tom's adventures through time to battle their nemesis, Totenkraft, the game's deuteragonist, which was a first for this series.
The game features the 'find the hidden object' objectives of the series, with two added devices. The Ring of Time allows you to travel through time to find the hidden object in the past/future, and the X-Glass functions as a pseudo-X-ray for looking through things (for example, boxes).

name: Pokémon Refined Gold
description: This is a romhack meant to enhance and improve Pokémon HeartGold while keeping the original feel. Instead of being a complete reworking of the game, this is essentially “Vanilla HeartGold+”, with versions exclusives fixed, trade evolutions rectified, evolution items and berries both renewable, and alternatives provided for the more luck-based encounters. A good-sized amount of dialogue has been changed, as well as a handful of NPCs being added to explain some of the more obscure mechanics, not to mention superbosses to test your mettle. The core plot is identical to vanilla HeartGold. If you want to go back to HeartGold, whether to revisit memories or make new ones, this mod is meant to help make them a little more vivid.

name: Pokémon Revelation
description: Pokémon Revelation is a vanilla quality-of-life enhancement decompilation hack of Pokémon Emerald. Pokémon Revelation aims to add as many QoL features as possible from the more recent games while looking and feeling just like vanilla Emerald and maintaining compatibility with the official games. Features include: catching all 386 Pokémon, reusable TMs, battle difficulty, decapitalization, and much more!

name: Alive
description: Learn about humanity’s sin of greed in an escape room game where you play as Chris, a poor young man who looks for easy ways to get money but ends up in a virtual reality he can’t escape. Help Chris escape the rooms while uncovering the story behind them, and the man who created them.

name: Abnormal Status: Tattoo, Prohibited Books, Parasites
description: In the present day, the majority of the human race has become capable of using magic. The sudden rise of this power has not been met with adequate laws and regulations, and the world is rapidly becoming a wasteland as crimes and discrimination intensify.

name: Alkey the Brave
description: Alkey the Brave is an action adventure game with a focus on dynamic battles. Go through an exciting adventure in ancient time, fight hordes of thugs, struggle with cruel tyrants, gather brave warriors under your banner and defeat cryptic invaders.

name: Alone in the Outback
description: Alone in the Outback is a story-driven survival experience. Traverse through the Australian outback, survive deadly heat of the day and cold of the night. Stay hydrated and choose your strategy to survive the dangerous Australian wildlife. Explore the territory to find out why you are here alone...

name: Alpha Terminus
description: As a member of the Special Raiding Forces, you attack alien bases as a Ball turret gunner in virtual reality.

name: Altf42
description: A chicken that calls itself a king! Really, who is the chicken king?Avoid more powerful traps!

name: A Matter of Principle
description: A Matter of Principle is an interactive historical comic in visual novel format. You have to participate in one of the most high-profile events of the XX century.

name: Amber Battle Royale
description: Play Amber - the next generation of free-to-play Battle Royale. Jump from a plane to Misfit Island and land with a Jetpack. Collect weapons and destroy enemies in three PvP modes: Battle Royale, Elimination, Deathmatch. Collect first aid kits, shield, and fuel. Up to 200 players in one match!

name: Amber Time Pocket

name: A Midnight Village Story
description: Welcome to Midnight Village, an island where the night rules the skies, yet the folk live simple, cozy lives... but in a village where night rules the skies, are there any secrets to be discovered?

You can return to the original game at any time without losing the SaveGame!

name: Ancient Farm
description: Plow, sow, and reap. Sounds familiar? Not this time. Ancient Farm may not be the first farming simulator but it’s the first one to take you back thousands of years into the past, to ancient times where technology wasn’t nearly as impressive as it is today, but humanity was just as hungry as always.

name: Attack Tactic
description: Attack Tactic mixes top-down turn-based combat with classic dungeon crawling for a unique strategic experience. Explore, upgrade, and fight as you devise clever plans to safely make your way deeper into hostile dungeons and through enemy territory.

name: Attack on King: Reloaded
description: As the king, you have to fight for your kingdom with all your might. Move carefully, load your gun, aim at the enemy king and shoot without fail. With your smart strategies, you will fight your way through all levels and proudly take back what is rightfully yours with supreme glory.

name: Atak
description: Atak is a real time strategy action game with fast paced battles and chaotic outcomes. Fight your way through the singleplayer campaign, challenge a friend in a custom battle or explore a multitude of minigames.

name: Astoaria

name: A Steak Temple Panic: Chapter 2 - Welcome to Sanglinours

name: Ascent of Ashes
description: A colony sim set in a post-apocalyptic dystopia. Build and defend your base. Manage your survivors. Engage raiders, aliens, Remnant soldiers and other factions in real-time-with-pause combat. Or use stealth to outwit them. Explore the massive world. Survive at all costs

name: Around Us
description: Around Us is a 2d party game centered around the childhood game “Hide And Seek” or also known as “Prop Hunt”. You can play among your friends where players are randomly selected to be a hunter or a hider.

name: Aroma

description: Unsolved mysteries, unknown questions, lies and superstitions become history. With this new invention, it is now possible to reach absolute truths from the universe of zeros and ones. Anomalistic Revolution is a a story-rich game with 2D action-runner mechanics.
