description: Bleak Dystopia is a first-person episodic, cinematic adventure, where you witness a dystopian society and explore the tragic life story of such society’s denizens.

name: Cat Break Head to Head
description: Cat Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated Cat themed items tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Puzzle Games Bundle
description: Develop and unlock your logical thinking to its full potential.

name: Puzzle Collection: New Pieces
description: When you solve every puzzle, it’s time for additional pieces! Spend hours on solving 24 amazing jigsaw puzzles. There are a lot of amazing artworks, you can drown in the madness of beautiful pieces and solve them all!

name: Quantum Storm
description: The Quantum Computer has become self-aware! Destroy its image library before it learns enough to take over the world... Breakout Arcade Game with 300 retro levels prepared by Clive Townsend, famous 8-bit game designer.

name: Parents vs. Kids
description: Parents Vs Kids is a family game with a cartoon design that will spice up your daily life at home! The dishes to do, the dog to walk, the rooms to tidy up... Always chores, but no one to do them... Parents VS Kids is THE game that will decide for you who…

name: Montgomery Fox and the Revenge of Victor Draven
description: Montgomery Fox is accused of serious crime, while someone else is the culprit. Can you help Montgomery and find a man with a thousand faces?

name: Montgomery Fox and the Case of the Diamond Necklace
description: Very valuable diamond necklace was stolen. Police were unable to find the thief. It's your turn to show your detective skills!

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Masterpieces of World - Dogs and Cats in the Painting
description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Martial Knight
description: Transform Your Mind & Body

name: Lonely Mountains: Downhill - Redmoor Falls
description: Gear up for a trip around the lost trail of Redmoor Peaks in this free DLC. Take a chance on the new challenges to win the water elemental customization set.

name: Knights & Guns: Expansion Pack #2
description:
The village is under threat again, will you take up the challenge, Sir Gunsalot?

This includes: 10 new levels for you to bring back the peace, 5 new armor pieces to help you on your quest and ew enemies for that extra little kick.

name: Kao the Kangaroo: Yooka x Kao
description: Legends speak of a powerful duo who once collected every single item, even as far as the eye could see. Secrets revealed, coins collected, challenges overcome. They say to reflect your heroes, you must reflect their ways… The power of friendship and a lo…

name: Happy Animals Mini Golf
description: Happy Animals Mini Golf is a miniature version of golf in which participants compete by hitting a small ball into the hole with their clubs, trying to cover the distance in the minimum number of strokes.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Animals in Snow
description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Big Kids Games Collection Bundle
description: This children's games learning pack contains 6 fantastic children's games!

name: Car Parking Madness School Drive Mechanic Car Games Simulator 2023
description: What is the most difficult element in driving a car? parking? you are absolutely right. In game you will be able to improve your parking skill. In the game you will be able to find many parking options with varying degrees of difficulty.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Colorful Sweets
description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Hero of Justice Pack 1
description: Play as characters from the Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero movie! Gamma 1, Gamma 2, and Gohan (DBS Super Hero) are available in addition to new movie-related Parallel Quests, Additional Moves, Costumes, and much more!

name: Family Chess: Definitive Edition
description: Pick your favorite Choose one of the heros and challenge other players in this family-friendly version of Chess. Thanks to the cartoony graphics, this variation can be enyojed by people of all ages.

name: First Time in Rome: Collector's Edition
description: Kate and Nicole enjoy everything the city of Rome has to offer. Will Kate still find time to complete the assignment?

name: Football Manager 2023 Touch
description: Play the beautiful game your way in Football Manager 2023 Touch as you experience the thrill of football management.

name: Splatter: Zombiecalypse Now + The Hong Kong Massacre
description: Unleash a storm of bullets against your enemies in two action-packed, top-down shooters.

name: Scar of the Doll: A Psycho-Horror Story about the Mystery of an Older Sister
description:
Scar of the Doll is an original psycho-suspense Visual Novel produced by Child-Dream in 1998, when became an exceptional hit. With its psychologically compelling horror elements and highly dramatic scenario, the game became a hot topic of discussion, including a feature in a mystery magazine, becoming a pioneer in the indie adventure genre.

This 2022 remake completely overhauls the original game's visuals. New content for the second half of the story has been added. In addition, a zapping scenario from different sub-character's points of view has been introduced.

name: Liberated: Enhanced Edition + NecroWorm Bundle
description: Experience action, quick thinking and fast reactions in this two-game indie bundle.

name: Lament of the Yuppie
description: Horror at work, horror at home. There is no escape!

name: Blazing Beaks + Badland: Game of the Year Edition
description: Stay sharp as danger lurks around every corner in these two colorful but twisted worlds.

name: Utopia
description: Utopia is a 2D top-down view barrage shooting RPG game played alone. The protagonist sets out on a journey to face various threats that befall the utopia world. Fight against a variety of incoming enemies and save the utopia world!

name: War Robots: Frontiers
description: War Robots: Frontiers is an online multiplayer mech shooter that launches the War Robots universe into the stars. Build and customize your mechs, squad up, and unleash the destructive power of your machines in epic online battles.

name: Social Credit Simulator
description: Social Credit Simulator is a 2D game in which you control a person who assigns each person a social rating based on his actions and social status

name: Puzzle Pieces 5: Fairy Ring
description: Go on a Wonderful Jigsaw Journey and earn Mana to reveal a Magical World. Enjoy this interesting puzzle images in this fairy adventure. Play 7 chapters with more than 250 HD levels. This game is 100% perfection, attention is paid to every detail, best in class. Enjoy!

name: Beat Back VR
description: This game is a rhythm game in which you move your body and destroy flying magic balls. Blow away your stress with a powerful blow, and collect various cards

name: Fallen Arena
description: This is a leisure competitive game, fighting for crystals in the arena, getting bigger, defeating opponents. New heroes, new skills and new weapons, call your friends to fight together~

name: Forge of Destiny
description: Forge of Destiny is the first Spanish RPG to combat disinformation through a steampunk dystopia. Create your character, travel through the Node-capital and venture into the ruins of the forgotten world. Live a unique experience of classic style in which discerning the truth will be a challenge.

name: Sweet Holiday Jigsaws: Trick or Treat
description: The Jigsaw Master Maker has rescued us from a treatless Halloween. Hundreds of fun colorfull puzzles to brighten things up around here. Chose number of pieces from 30 to 1024. An unique function to add extra non-related pieces into the picture to be solved. Full of excitement.

name: Crispy Puppy
description: Crispy Puppy is a horror game about a very old creepypasta.

name: Pichi Girl
description: Pichi Girl is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: HellRazor64
description: A convict on death row, sentenced to die by electrocution. You awaken in Hell at the mercy of an ancient weapon, the Hellrazor, and you must fulfill its conquest. Reign in Hell or die trying.

name: Sunny Memories
description: Sunny Memories is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Sliding Puzzle Deluxe: The Classic
description: Sliding Puzzle Deluxe: The Classic is a game where you have to slide pieces around to get them in the right spot. If you have all pieces in the right spot, you complete the level!

name: Furious Sword
description: Furious Sword - This tells the story of a mysterious vagabond who fights the forces of evil for good. He will have to go through many trials on his way and who knows how it will end. Explore a huge world, fight gloomy monsters.

name: Green Garden
description: Green Garden is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Pinball FX3: Marvel Pinball - Cinematic Pack
description: Tables inspired by blockbuster films in the Marvel Cinematic Universe come together in this thrilling pack featuring "Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy", "Marvel's Avengers: Age of Ultron" and "Marvel's Ant-Man."

name: The Cube
description:
Based on the hit TV show!
Have you got what it takes to beat The Cube?

name: Mushrooman
description: Indie horror about giant killer mushrooms.

name: In the Building: Cats
description: Is a game in which you need to find all the cute cats. Cats will hide in all apartments of a multi-storey building. Search every corner of the room, move the pillows, open the bedside tables, check the toilet.... Cats can hide in the most unpredictable places.

name: Trials of Cascadia
description: As the son of a farmer, Isaac had always dreamt of one day becoming a Paladin like the Chosen Hero, Zvarus. After a year of training, Isaac sets off with his sword and holy book alongside his friend to vanquish the forces of Darkness that beset the world. But not all is as it seems on the surface.

name: Grid Legends: Rise of Ravenwest
description: Race into the history of Ravenwest and discover how they rose to racing infamy.

name: Rocpain: Rock Paper Scissors
description: A paper airplane fights against Rock, Paper and Scissors. The ROCPAIN gameplay is inspired on the rock-paper-scissors hand game, and like the original hand game, each enemy only its destroyed with the right shot. A new way to play shooting games that will challenge your skills.

name: Udongein X: Seiran
description: Add Seiran as a playable character to Udongein X, along with her own story.

name: Horrifical Maze
description: Horrifical Maze Is A 3D Realistic Horror-Adventure Game.Travel Threw Mazes And Complete Missions, Survive, And Escape.This Game Contains Features That Most Games Dont Offer On Steam.Someone Is Coming For You (But Who?)

name: Liminus: The Silent Guard
description: Souls on their perilous journey through the afterlife are left defenseless against the hungry darkness without the protective guidance of the Shepherds. Locate your flock, protect them from wolves, and guide them safely back home with your array of abilities and powers in Liminus: The Silent Guard.

name: Tanks Logic
description: A game in which you control a tank and solve puzzles.

name: RaLo
description: RaLo is a minimal yet mind-bending drumming game that requires mental agility and precise timing. Hit the correct drums at the right time, but watch out for when you need to do the opposite.

name: Rerun
description: Rerun is a turn-based tactical rougelike where you must use thoughtful positioning and resource management in order to be victorious. Strategically plan your adventurers' randomly generated upgrade path as you progress through a dungeon that changes each run.

name: Maniac
description: Survival get-away with an ever-increasing cast of law enforcement. Level up by public property destruction, police kills and pedestrian murders. Classic GTA reimagined as a survival chase action + roguelite elements.

name: Cymut x Mutrobo
description: Help Dr. Albert to save our planet from this uncontrolled mutation of Cymuts and Mutrobos. Play with a friend on the same screen in 2 player mode.

name: Dragonheir: Silent Gods
description:
Authentic Dungeon Adventurous RPG Strategy Game

Dragonheir: Silent Gods is an open-world RPG that puts you in control of over 200 heroes. In this game, you'll experience strategic combat like never before, where every move counts and every decision could be the difference between victory and defeat. The multiverse concept allows you to travel through different worlds, exploring endless wonders and surprises.

name: Ruinwaker
description: A Sci-Fi action adventure VR Game. Play in singleplayer exploring the story of a lost ancient power, or fight alongside friends in Co-op missions! Want something faster paced? Try PVP Multiplayer across diverse maps from different worlds!

name: Elixir
description: Welcome to Elixir, a 2D strategic puzzle experience. Become an ancient alchemist with a mysterious past to unlock. Explore & find lost souls who need your help. Uncover Elixirs and experiment on them, and yourself. Embark on a dark journey to solve puzzles, unlock recipes and unearth hidden secrets.

name: Defeat Everyone
description: The world she knew was really different. The Akai girl will have to go through numerous battles, learn the secrets of magic spells and get a chance to gain freedom. Adventure and danger, magic and dragons, battles and the desire to gain freedom, all this is combined in the game Defeat Everyone.

name: Merchant of Bohemia
description: Fast-paced trade simulation game with RPG elements. Choose your character, buy goods and wander around the medieval Bohemia to make profit. Don't forget to recruit some manpower to keep you safe along the way!

name: Rina RhythmError
description: The indie rhythm game Rina RhythmError is now here, lighting up the retro electronic trend! Bring a unique BOSS Fight experience with the "ERROR Girls"!

name: Veiling Mask
description: Veiling Mask is set in a mysterious world, plagued by war and elemental storms. The kingdoms are arming themselves for battle. In these troubled times, a hero appears, who wants to keep the world together at its core.

name: Delusion
description: With all the nightmarish creatures on loose, Find your way out of the Asylum and uncover a grisly truth in the end in this First Person Nightmarish Horror. Play as Derek Muller a construction worker trying to find a way out only for him to find all his nightmares come to life..

name: DodgeBall World
description: Grab & throw unique balls directly at the face of your friends while dodging theirs in this FPS multiplayer game. Customize your own game modes, play in various maps & do the most insane trickshots possible in this brand new sport.

name: Star Leaping Story
description: Players will help a white-robed girl and her friends uncover the truth of the planet using unique dash gameplay. The storyline is fully voiced by renowned actors, with meticulously designed levels and energetic music for you to enjoy!

name: My Dream Setup
description: My Dream Setup is a simulation game about building the room you've always dreamed of. A huge selection of furniture, computers and their accessories, posters, pictures, plants, and other interior details await you. What is your imagination capable of?

name: Tinytown
description: Tinytown is a cozy building strategy and puzzle game where you create a small city by placing new buildings. Manage resources, upgrade buildings and use all the small space to build your dream city!

name: Counterspell
description: How long can you survive in this endless draw-em-up? Cast spells to defend yourself from the deadly warding glyphs.

name: Pal
description: A new mission awaits completion. Will you listen to Pal? Maintain your engine, lights, and oxygen levels while avoiding Pal and navigating towards destination

name: Poly Shoot
description: A very simple shooting game. Destroy those colored polygons!

name: Wanted Driver
description: Drive car and escape cops! Drive fast as you can to evade the cops. Buy faster cars and become the fastest driver.

name: The Waking Knot
description: A unique, fast, musical tactics game. Watch yourself stay afloat as you hone your instincts. Use versatile tools to resolve emergent situations creatively. Find your rhythm in the chaos of The Waking Knot. “...Do you feel that? Everything entangled in one beautiful mess!”

name: Pyrmd
description: Pyrmd, a Co-Op multiplayer horror game in an Egyptian pyramid, is played with one mummy and four survivors. Survivors must find the lost tablets and reach the door as quickly as possible to get rid of the mummy. The mummy must catch all of the survivors to win. Beware!

name: Dragon & Archer
description: Hunt animals, slay monsters, recruit dwarves, organize defenses, and adventure with your dragon in this crumbling land. Guard your base before being swallowed by evil creatures and find a way to teleport to a new world.

name: Sotidrokhima
description: Sotidrokhima is a semihistorical story-driven top-down hack-and-slash game with first-person elements.

name: Acryptia
description: Acryptia is a skill-based dungeon card game for browser, in which players have to beat Rug’O, the card dealer, to advance to new levels, climb the leaderboard, and complete Season Rewards.

name: Loppi Puzzle Magazine: Hirameku Soukangou
description: Loppi Puzzle Magazine: Hirameku Soukangou is a Puzzle game, developed by Game Studio and published by Success, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Loppi Puzzle Magazine: Kangaeru Dai-2-gou
description: Loppi Puzzle Magazine: Kangaeru Dai-2-gou is a Puzzle game, published by Success, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Loppi Puzzle Magazine: Kangaeru Dai-3-gou
description: Loppi Puzzle Magazine: Kangaeru Dai-3-gou is a Puzzle game, published by Success, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Loppi Puzzle Magazine: Kangaeru Puzzle Soukangou
description: Loppi Puzzle Magazine: Kangaeru Puzzle Soukangou is a Puzzle game, developed by Game Studio and published by Success, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Samus Goes to the Fridge to Get a Glass of Milk
description: Help Samus get a glass of milk for Adam at 2 AM.

name: Samus Goes to the Fridge to Get a Glass of Milk II
description:
Last time on Samus Goes to the Fridge to Get a Glass of Milk…

She fulfilled Adam’s deed, picking up the milk carton lying in the fridge. However, after gunning down the Omega Metroid, she looked around, finding no exit before the subzero temperatures knocked her out cold (pun somewhat intended). When she woke up, she found herself in her regular power suit, in a different area of the station. While she was all there in one piece, there was one problem–the milk wasn’t! And Samus knew better than to fail Adam’s orders at 3 AM.

This contest hack continues the tale of Samus’s venture to get Adam a glass of milk, this time as a hack of a game few have ever attempted making hacks for. Will Samus get through okay and recover the milk once again? Find out in Samus Goes to the Fridge to Get a Glass of Milk II!

name: Fur Squadron
description: Fur Squadron is an arcade space shooter on rails, which follows the adventure of a team of elite pilots during what seems at first a routine training in virtual reality.

name: Panzer Campaigns: Rumyantsev '43
description:
For the Germans the Battle of Kursk was to be the premier summer operation in 1943, slowing the building Russian momentum. The battle was an Axis failure, and the Germans considered the operation finished by the middle of July.

For the Soviets, the early July battles were but the defensive phase of the Battle of Kursk, designed to wear out their German opponent. The Russian offensives that followed, first, Operation Kutuzov in the north, lasting from 14 July to 14 August, and Operation Rumyantsev from 3 August to 23 August were the culmination of the Soviet summer strategy.

Facing the Soviet Union's forces to defend Kharkov were the post Kursk, depleted 4th Panzerarmee and Army Detachment Kempf, soon renamed as 8th Army. Crisis both to the north at Bryansk during Operation Kutusov and on the Mius River to the south on the Azov Sea, saw the Axis forces at their weakest as the Soviets prepared to take back Kharkov in the fourth and final battle for the largest city in Eastern Ukraine.

In Rumyantsev '43, as the commander of the three Russian Fronts - Voronezh, Steppe & Southwestern, you have multiple armies at your disposal to defeat the vaunted but battered German Wehrmacht. As the German commander you will have at your disposal the still powerful panzer forces able to wreak havoc upon their Soviet foes. Included are scenarios that let you recreate all the major phases of the campaign from the initial German assault on the southern flank of the Battle of Kursk, to the culmination of Operation Rumyantsev, approaching the mighty Dnepr River. The stage is set! All that is lacking is for you to kick off one of the most significant campaigns of Summer 1943 on the Eastern Front!

name: Little Big Horn
description: The intro to the Early American Wars series covers the historic battle along the Little Big Horn river in Montana in 1876 between the U.S. 7th Cavalry and the gathered tribes of the Sioux and Northern Cheyenne. While this topic is a bit smaller scale than the normal battles covered by the engine, it will still give you a good idea of how the overall game engine works so you can transition to one of our full games.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 4: Halloween Edition
description: This is the Halloween Edition of Five Nights at Freddy's 4, available free for a limited time. Enjoy the game all over again with new characters and new options!

name: Get in the Car, Loser!: The Fate of Another World
description: Every 976 years, the heavens pick one warrior to hear the calling and use the Sword of Fate to seal away the Machine Devil. Emily Harmless used to be an activist, a librarian, and a scholar... but she had to put that all aside when she was chosen as that warrior. Is there any hope for her to find peace in the burning ruins of her world after carrying out the heavens’ mission?

name: Tonka: Dig'n Rigs
description: Tonka Dig'n Rigs is a Tonka PC play set game with a Rig Controls play set for your computer's keyboard. released on May 2, 2000.
